Player History
Injured on 8/22/1982 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/3/1983, off Eric Gilmour (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/15/1984, off Carl Peak (Mal)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Toledo on 2/19/1985 (Going to PIT: P W. Eyman. Going to TOL: P D. Castrejon, LF L. Jackson)...
Signed as a free agent by Northeastern on 2/23/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $3,300,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/10/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $1,271,300 per year...
Traded from Bay City to Ashburn on 5/31/1991 (Going to BC: CF I. Kempton. Going to Ash: P D. Castrejon, 1B W. Heeter)...
